text: Max Hauri (30 December 1941 - 6 December 2015) was a Swiss equestrian. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swiss male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Max Hauri
